headline: Eaton Ranked #1 on Investor’s Business Daily’s 50 Most Sustainable Companies for 2025
summary: DUBLIN, November 10, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced it has been named the number one most sustainable company on Investor’s Business Daily’s (IBD) prestigious list of the 50 Most Sustainable Companies for 2025.

headline: Data Center IT Infrastructure Business Analysis Report 2025: Market to Grow by Over $500 Billion by 2030 with ABB, Accenture, CommScope, Device42, and Eaton at the Forefront of Expansion
summary: The global Data Center IT Infrastructure market offers key opportunities through digital transformation, with rising demands for scalable, efficient infrastructure driven by cloud adoption, big data analytics, and sustainability. Advances in hyper-converged infrastructure, edge computing, and AI enhance operational efficiency, enabling agile and sustainable growth.
